channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mirror has been moved, 22nd May
item.description:
The mirror to help drivers see so they are able to give way to the right has been turned the other way. This stops drivers being able to see what is coming from the right as this can be very difficult on this roundabout due to the corner.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post of sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: There is no drainage on the tescos side of the zebra crossing and when it rains a massive puddle is made and cars splash pedestrians waiting to cross the road., 21st May
item.description:
There is no drain installed in the new zebra crossing and when it rains a massive puddle is made pedestrians are getting wet. This is a poor job done on the new crossing and should be fixed as the cycle land road works has made this issue by raising the crossing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstructed view to oncoming traffic, 21st May
item.description:
On Kidnappers Lane adjacent to the Vineries and extending towards The Moat. Road Narrowing allowing only one car to pass. With signs each end to indicate who has priority
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 21st May
item.description:
Email received 21/05/2024 - copy attached. Customer reports that a Lime Tree at the location is covered in Ivy, which is encroaching on the path. They have requested that this receives some attention.
Report on FixMyStreet
